data.name: Seasonal Cotton Loan
data.description: Short term finance to help you manage your cash flow during the cotton growing season's peak input periods.

features.additionalInfo: Guarantor may be required for loan applications.

features.additionalValue: Includes advanced notifications sent to clients.
features.additionalInfo: An alert about future events or notifications.
Cheque book. This feature is available only to those existing clients that had activated it on or before 1-Sep-2023.
Redraw of repaid principal is available.
Relationship management is available for all Farm Business clients.
Unlimited free transactions available to clients.

eligibility.additionalInfo: The applicant and each account owner must be at least 18 years old.

fees.name: Cheque Book Fee (Standard 50)
fees.additionalInfo: This fee is applicable only to those existing clients that are eligible to order new cheque books.

fees.name: Cheque Book Fee (Large 50)
fees.additionalInfo: This fee is applicable only to those existing clients that are eligible to order new cheque books.

fees.name: Cheque Book Fee (Large 100)
fees.additionalInfo: This fee is applicable only to those existing clients that are eligible to order new cheque books.

fees.name: Loan Establishment Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable on acceptance of a Letter of Offer and non-refundable.

fees.name: Loan Limit Increase Fee
fees.additionalInfo: When the Loan Limit is increased.

fees.name: Legal Fees
fees.additionalInfo: Incurred by the Bank relating to a Loan or securities.

fees.name: Registration Fees
fees.additionalInfo: In connection with registration and electronic conveyancing processing, relating to securities for a Loan.

fees.name: Disbursements
fees.additionalInfo: In connection with documentation preparation and administration.

fees.name: Mortgage Discharge Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Where the Bank attends or effects an electronic based release/discharge. 250.00 AUD for up to 5 release/discharge of mortgage (calculated per mortgage dealing) and/or security interest (calculated per grantor). Then, 50.00 AUD per each additional release/discharge of mortgage and/or security interest.
